Great little spot in an easy to get to area. The deck was a perfect place for coffee in the morning and cocktails in the evening. Very clean and hosts were very helpful.

Scott's place was the ideal stay for our visit to Milwaukee to attend a wedding. Everything was as advertised: clean, functional, and private. We enjoyed walking to the many quaint cafés and restaurants in the neighborhood as well.

Scott's place had just what we needed for a quick stay... studio apartment type set up. However, there is only street parking available. We parked out front of the property, and our car was stolen in the early morning hours. After speaking with an officer, he stated that the location of the airbnb was not the best. If I go to Milwaukee again, I would pay more for a nicer area or a safer place to park.
Cool spot. Helpful host. Well appointed.

This was a great stay in MKE. The hosts leave plenty of little surprises for their guests. Location was quiet, felt safe, and was easily walkable to breweries etc. Street parking is available for free and we were able to park it right next to our window. They leave plenty of brochures for all attractions nearby and any information you need about your stay.

Great stay in Milwaukee. One of the most well stocked Airbnb's I have stayed in with snacks, kitchen tools, and amenities. Great location for me as very close to a friend i was visiting. A little far for walking to bars and restaurants, but very close to water and 3rd Ward if driving.
This place was so cozy! Perfect for a long weekend in MKE!

Such a great stay for the 4th of July weekend! Tons of snacks, utensils, and hygiene items were stocked and ready for our use, loved the root beer floats! Location was perfect for walking or taking a short drive to the beach. I definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay in Milwaukee, WI. Scott was also kind enough to lend some lawn chairs for firework viewing, super happy we chose this Airbnb!
Absolutely wonderful stay for my first time in Milwaukee! Super comfy, very clean, and right in a great spot (within walking distance of some really good places)! Loved it!

The room is beautiful and just perfect for my wife and me. We were surprised a number of times by the surprised left in the kitchen for us, beginning with fresh cupcakes upon our arrival. A great location which is perfectly removed from the downtown area! We came up from Chicago to catch a few games at Great American Ballpark and were there in 10 minutes.
Great place, a lot of homey touches and terrific value!

The loft is a charming get-a-way... yet in the city. It is in a nice neighborhood from which you can leisurely walk to the Third Ward and Public Market in 20-30 minutes or drive in 7 minutes. The loft was clean with lots of extras including fresh layed eggs and honey from the hosts' bees! We loved having a full kitchen so we could make a meal or two. We also enjoyed relaxing on the balcony in the evening. Scott and Noreena were gracious hosts, and we hope to visit again!

Great place! Had everything you can think of and super cute! They made sure we felt welcomed and had solutions to anything we were unsure about (where trash goes, how the ice machine works, etc). The only thing that might be an issue is that it’s close to the highway, but it wasn’t a major issue for my stay. Would stay again and recommend!

Scott’s loft was an amazing base from which to explore the city! Could not ask for a better location, and the apartment itself was well stocked with amenities. When there a problem with the AC, Scott delivered a replacement unit within hours. Highly recommend!

This is, hands down, the greatest Airbnb my husband and I have ever stayed in. It doesn’t get any better! Immaculately clean, cozy, comfortable, and charming. Wonderful and thoughtful touches throughout- plenty of helpful information, a fully stocked kitchen and bathroom, and incredible and detailed communication from Scott ahead of time. If you are looking to stay in Milwaukee and have come across this treasure of a place, do not hesitate for a moment to book it!!
Scott's place was great-- great location, great amenities. He communicated very well with us. Would stay again!

Scott’s studio was clean, well decorated, and spacious enough for two! I felt safe arriving late to his place, comfortable with check-in and check-out procedures, and communication with him was prompt and helpful! In a good location (about 1 mile from the Third Ward) so easily walkable! Highly recommend!
My stay at Scott's place was perfect. It was comfortable and I had everything I needed. I would definitely stay there again!

This is THE place to stay in MKE! It was absolutely the spotless, beautifully decorated and the perfect place for our three night stay in MKE. This is probably the most hospitable air B and B we have ever stayed at. Their thoughtful touches are unmatched! The location also cannot be beat with it being downtown.
Great place to stay!
This listing was just as expected. Being right off the expressway gives access to unlimited options. The snacks and other food items were an added bonus. Would highly recommend
A fantastic spot! Great hosts that did an amazing job on the place. In walking distance from tons of great sights, eats, and drinks. Would 110% stay there again on my next Milwaukee trip.
Scott was very accommodating and the studio is beautiful!

I loved the layout and the ambiance of this place, with the high ceilings and the spacious area between the bed and the TV made it easy for me to do my home workouts! Scott is also a great host!
The immediate area is a little rough but this location is still very close to the Third Ward which is a super awesome area!! If you stay here, you MUST check out the Milwaukee Public Market; that was my favorite thing I visited while I was in MKE. If you’re in to coffee shops, I very much recommend Colectivo Coffee; that’s a great one.
this place is so cute and comfy!

My family and I loved this little loft it was so cozy and stayed super warm for the winter. My daughter really enjoyed her stay too. It definitely felt like home. I will actually miss this little place! Thank you for all the goodies you had there for us as well!!

Scott's accommodations made our visit to Milwaukee a great experience. The region experienced frigid temperatures before we arrived and Scott made sure that the loft was heated and warmed upon our arrival - it's the little things! The living space was clean, expertly decorated, and included all the amenities we needed (should I mention the hot chocolate and heart-shaped cookies for Valentine's Day!). The space is conveniently located near great restaurants, grocery stores, and shops in Walker's Point. This is a perfect place to stay if you are looking to explore Milwaukee or need a weekend away!
Great studio space with generous amenities and helpful hosts!

This place exceeded my expectations. It was charming, quiet, and had everything needed for a pleasant stay! Scott and Noreena added some wonderful thoughtful touches, such as special treats, to make you feel welcomed! Highly recommended!
This was a great place to stay for the weekend. They offered a lot of information upfront of places to go in the area. Street parking was straightforward, and was easy to find around the area.

We really enjoyed our stay at Scott’s place! It was a great location near many of the cities local attractions. We cannot brag enough on the apartment. The decorations were beautiful and the apartment has everything you could need- including those small things that you forget to bring or travel with. We would highly recommend this place if you are in the area!
Very clean and stylish space. This is a cozy studio apartment that is in a great spot to travel either to the inner city or suburbs.
One of the best experiences I had with Airbnb! They were so sweet and helpful.
I loved it. Absolutely beautiful and clean as a whistle.
The stay was great and exceeded expectations. Super creative space with everything you'll need.
Beautifully decorated and functional loft.
Good place. The only criticism is the wifi which fluctuates and often crashes without reason or warning.

This place was just great! The host did an amazing job of thinking ahead and providing fun things for our stay. Great place, great location

Everything was fantastic, from the self check-in, to the stylish loft, to the many, many thoughtful touches including homemade sweet bread, local honey, well stocked kitchen with a large variety of snacks and teas. It was lovely. Appreciate the local tips and loved being able to walk to Milwaukee Public Market, not one but two Colectivo Coffee houses and many fine brew houses and restaurants. Some were closed due to COVID but it wasn't hard to find a place nearby. We'd stay again in a second.

Excellent place.!! Very clean, organized and well appointed for longer stays. Hosts have made many small touch’s that make you feel welcome and comfortable. Would love to stay again when my travel plans permit.
Amazing host, they had so many amenities available at the space. I wanted to stay another day, but unfortunately they were booked. Definitely will try to stay there again, next vacation.
This was an excellent spot for our stay in Milwaukee. Centrally located, comfortable and a lot of great perks, our favorite of which was the honey made right in the back yard! Would highly recommend.
Beautiful place, even nicer than the photos suggest, wonderful view, great communication and an awesome stay.
Such a lovely space!! We had a great time staying here. Very clean and located close to many great places. Thanks for the stay!!
Wish the tv had cable but that was my only qualm. This will be a wonderful stay for anyone hoping to stay here. Definitely recommend for couples!

Scott and Noreena’s place is lovely! Exceptionally clean. They are hospitable and thoughtful- leaving extra snacks, a couple beers in the fridge and toiletries should you run out. Whenever I visit Milwaukee, I am absolutely returning here.

Scott and Noreena are such hospitable hosts! Their loft was perfect for our needs: close to all of the attractions (including just a 2 mile bike ride from Lake Michigan), a kitchen complete with what we needed, extra touches like breakfast cereal, tea, granola bars, and even four eggs from their chickens. Definitely one of our best airbnb stays!
This place was great, had everything you needed and then some!

This studio loft is in a great location in the Walkers Point neighborhood of Milwaukee. The space is charming and well equipped and the kitchen is stocked with essentials. Scott is a terrific host. Wonderful location. Within walking distance of so many cool local spots. Scott and Noreena included some wonderful local tips and the loft was cozy and hip. Would definitely stay here again!
Warm and cozy! A convenient location that is comfortable and full of special touches to make your stay restful.

Having lived in Milwaukee for 30+ years and retired "down south", we absolutely loved this rental as a perfect home base to see family and friends. Also, our dog loved going for walks in the neighborhood and nearby park.

The house was immaculate, very clean and decorated with style. It was greatly located in the neighborhood of Wauwatosa within walking distance of many parks and The Village shopping center. We had a great time. Highly recommended if you’re visiting Milwaukee.
Great spot for a quick overnight stay. Thanks for the food recommendations!

Wonderful stay in Wauwatosa at such a cute home! Had everything we needed and the host was easy to communicate with and helped us add an extra day to our stay! Loved it, would be grateful to be able to stay again. Thanks!

We had a great stay here!

Would definitely stay here again!

House was clean and cozy. It was well described. Host was flexible and helpful.
Neighborhood was well kept and safe. Great stay!
This was the perfect spot for our family (2 young kids and our dog). Jen was very responsive and everything was as described.

Jens place was amazing and not too far from American family field! It was safe and secure as well as the neighborhood! I really enjoyed staying there and would stay again!!

We absolutely loved our stay! The house was so beautifully decorated and we felt right at home. We will definitely stay here next time we are in the area!
What a cute place! We really appreciated the well stocked kitchen, the cleanliness and the security lighting outside. It made visiting our family possible. We look forward to visiting again.
We had a great time at The Collected Casa! The home was beautiful, and the location was very quiet/peaceful. Can't wait to stay here again in the future!
Our 3rd stay and I am sure not the last. we enjoy the central location, the fact that dogs are welcome and how comfortable it is.
Great place to stay. Very clean and comfortable.

This house was so nice inside! We loved the kitchen and decor. The neighborhood was so quiet and peaceful. Will definitely book Jen's place again next time we visit Milwaukee!
My second time here! Cute, very comfortable and well appointed. Location is great in quiet neighborhood and dog friendly!

We came with our two little kids and had a wonderful stay. Easy to find, easy to park, peaceful neighborhood, extremely clean. Proximity to Whole Foods (5 min drive) was also helpful. Great place!

Charming, comfortable home, conveniently located for our stay, quiet, very walkable and pleasant neighborhood. Was a wonderful temporary home base for our visit with extended family living nearby. Jen is very responsive. Her home is very clean, nicely decorated, is well kept and in a very nice neighborhood. Easy access to the city and surrounding areas. We enjoyed our stay there and will definitely return. Great place.

This home was so beautiful! The colors, the art, the overall decor are amazing! Not only is the home lovely to look at, it is welcoming and comfortable. Jen was wonderful to work with and answered all of the questions we had - so accommodating and kind. We can't wait to stay here again on another trip to MKE!
Very nice home, great location. Comfy bed, nice kitchen and dog friendly!

Collected Casa was absolutely one of the best properties we have stayed at over the past year. The property was immaculately clean and location was ideal - quiet, tree-lined neighborhood.

We highly recommend this property and will stay again on our next trip to Milwaukee.
We loved Jen’s place and will definitely be staying there when we visit again!

Very pretty place while also being functional.

Absolutely loved our stay at Jen’s place. The home was beautifully decorated- with attention to fine details and conveniences such as the multi-way coffee bar, sound machines in each bedroom, adorable and stocked linen closet, the luggage racks in each bedroom, and everything you need to build a fire.

The location was perfect- close to downtown with plenty to do. The neighborhood felt safe and was very walkable with our pups. We always appreciate a home we can bring our dogs! Overall was an awesome stay and would highly recommend to friends or family!

We loved staying here! It was decorated so well, beautiful kitchen and great dining table! Felt like home right away, toddler friendly (Not too many nick-nacks) and just two blocks from a park!
Beds were comfy, sound machines in both rooms were really appreciated so we didn’t have to travel with ours. No complaints!!
Great hosts and great house! We will stay here again when visiting Milwaukee!
Jenn's place was great! The house was really cute and well decorated. Her recommendations for places to eat in the area were also perfect. We'd definitely stay at her place again!
The house was clean, comfortable, and in a great location. Jen was pleasure to communicate with, and I hope to be back sometime! Highly recommend
This airbnb was so welcoming, warm and cozy. It was so clean and loved all the attention to detail - it truly felt like home away from home. Jen was quick to respond and very accommodating to us.
The Collected Casa was a quiet and cute place to stay while we visited friends and family in the Milwaukee area. Easy access get to, yet peaceful.

Beautiful decor, comfy bedding, well-stocked kitchen- all as advertised or better. The space is larger than it would seem from the photos or from the outside- and all rooms are airy and bright. Close to lots of parks and restaurants. We would definitely recommend for couples or families!
Excellent location and house perfect set up as BnB. This was the best Airbnb we’ve stayed in as everything was set up perfectly. New kitchen and bathroom and great set up of furniture, paintings etc
The place was immaculate and everything worked great. Thank you Jen!
This home was impeccably clean with stylish renovations and decor. There was a small issue in the home but Jen was super responsive and it got fixed immediately! Overall, a wonderful stay!

Fantastic host. House was interior design delight!!!!
Wonderful stay! Thank you!

This place was a super cute stay near the heart of Wauwatosa. We loved exploring the area and venturing the 20 minutes to the city for some famous Milwaukee bloody Mary’s! Highly recommend this clean and stylish place as your home base when visiting Milwaukee!

Perfection! Wonderful place to stay!
Great spot in a good neighborhood. Place was spacious and comfortable. Jen was fantastic to communicate with and left great recommendations. Will stay again!

Jen & Brett's place was exactly what we were looking for. Our son and two dogs loved our stay, and would happily stay here again, on our next visit to Milwaukee. thank you for opening your home to our family!

Extremely clean and comfortable. Safe and cool neighborhood. Lots of extras. Under 20min drive to anywhere in Milwaukee. Would love to stay there again when back in the area.

I loved staying here! The house was incredibly clean and beautifully decorated. Jen was a great host and responded to messages quickly and with clear instructions. This is a great place to stay in Milwaukee, I would definitely stay here again!

Beautiful, bright, and clean home that was perfect for our trip. Jen was a wonderful, responsive host. I would definitely stay here again.

We highly recommend this home!

The place was secure and served as an excellent home base and recharging point for our explorations of Walker's Point and everywhere else around Milwaukee, in between attending our daughter's Ultimate Frisbee college nationals tournament in town. Just a few of our long list of recommendations: for Walker's Point there is a *lot within walking distance, restaurants, craft beer places and bars, even an old school jazz place less than two blocks away, Caroline's - the real deal. The Noble is an excellent, tiny bar/restaurant not to be missed, get the crawfish jambalaya if it's your lucky day and it's on the inventive, changing menu. MobCraft for an extensive craft beer (and pizza) menu and they're friendly and generous with tasting. The 3rd Ward is just across one of the river bridges and so much to explore there including the Public Market and many shops around the neighborhood. Purple Door in WP for ice cream, but farther away and worth it: Kopp's for *frozen custard* we found is the best quality for taste and value (omg a 2 scoop on waffle cone is gigantic!); and Leon's if you want the traditional drive up experience (and the custard's super good there too!) - both driving distance. If you want to walk along an authentic, natural part of Lake Michigan, we were overjoyed to discover Doctors Park and the Audubon Center at Fox Point up north, driving distance. We could have spent hours there but the sun was setting, unforgettable - wish we'd gone back for sunrise! Next time. The parks near the Milwaukee Art Museum were wonderful also, more of a walk but doable. If you want vegan food like my partner, close by there's On the Bus at the Public Market, and up north the cool and funky Wonderland and Art Bar, both solid options and we really enjoyed. We would definitely love to stay at Blue Serif when in Milwaukee next time. Thanks again, Julie Ann!
